title: Problem With PBE Account
body:
Every time i open the PBE client it makes me reinstall everything (the client, the updates, it makes me accept terms of service again, EVERYTHING) And when i try to open the client from my hotbar it doesnt let me, so it makes me reinstall everything and open it from my folders....

PLZ HELP

replies.body: It sounds like you have security settings preventing the pbe patcher from launching correctly.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure it's being added as an exception.  I hope that helps!
I found out what the problem was, i downloaded the client from the wrong area and was on an old client, so it was trying to use files that still had some bugs that the newer one had already fixed...
thanks, ill try that (new runes amazing btw)
